com.software.reuze

Class dg_Steering

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.dg_Steering
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    dg_i_SteeringConstants, Cloneable

    public class dg_Steering
extends Object
implements Cloneable, dg_i_SteeringConstants
    Objects of this class are used to describe the steering behavior for a Vehicle object. Each vehicle should have its own SB object.
    This class supports 15 different behaviors which can be combined to provide steering behaviors suitable for different game environments.
    A large number of constants are defined to simplify the use of this class.
    Behavior constants
     WALL_AVOID     OBSTACLE_AVOID          EVADE           FLEE    SEPARATION      
    
 ALIGNMENT      COHESION                        SEEK            ARRIVE  WANDER 
    
 PURSUIT                OFFSET_PURSUIT          INTERPOSE       HIDE    PATH    
    
 FLOCK


    Force calculation constants
     WEIGHTED_AVERAGE   PRIORITIZED


    Agents (other Vehicle objects) to pursue, evade etc.
     AGENT0 AGENT1          AGENT_TO_PURSUE         AGENT_TO_FLEE


    Author:
    Peter Lager

      • setPursuitOffset

        public void setPursuitOffset(ga_Vector2D offset)
        Set the offset position for a pursuit. The position should be calculated as if the pursued was facing along the x axis.
        Parameters:
        offset - coordinates for offset

      • addToPath

        public void addToPath(List<dag_GraphNode> route)
        Add the route to the end of the existing path. Do nothing if the parameter is null.
        Parameters:
        route - the path to add

      • addToPath

        public void addToPath(dag_GraphFloatingEdges graph,
             dag_GraphNode dest)
        Calculate and add the route from the end of the existing path (or the nearest node if there is no existing path) to the dest Node. The path calculation will use A* with crow's flight heuristic when calculating the route.
        The instruction is ignored if the graph or destination node does not exist.
        Parameters:
        graph -
        dest -

      • getPathStart

        public dag_GraphNode getPathStart()
        Get the node the entity is currently moving towards. If there is no path defined or the entity has reached the end of its last path the method returns null.
        Returns:
        current path target or null if none

      • setDetectBoxLength

        public void setDetectBoxLength(double boxLength)
        Set the minimum length of the obstacle detection box.
        The actual box length increases with the entity speed and at maximum speed will be double the minimum length.
        Parameters:
        boxLength -

                       double fov,
                       double maxLength)

        Parameters:
        numOfWhiskers - the number of whiskers (should be >= 3)

      • setCalculateMethod

        public void setCalculateMethod(int method)
        Set which method is to be used for calculating the steering force, options are 
         SBF.WEIGHTED_AVERAGE (default) or SBF.PRIORITIZED
        any other value will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        method - the method to use

      • calculateForce

        public ga_Vector2D calculateForce(double deltaTime,
                         dg_World world)
        Calculates (according to selected calculation method) the steering forces from any active behaviors.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - time since last update in seconds
        world - the game world object
        Returns:
        the calculated steering force as a Vector2D
